pages.text: Stonelings are passive creatures that can be found in the deep underground.$(br2)They will spawn in carrying an item, and will get startled if you get too close to them without sneaking and holding a Diamond to tempt them.$(br2)If startled, they will run away from you and finally poof out of existence.
On death, they will drop the item its carrying as well a Heart of Diamond.

A Heart of Diamond, when used on any stone block will let you create your own tamed Stoneling!$(br2)Tamed Stonelings can hold items you give them, eat Stone (they love it!), and follow you if you hold a Diamond.$(br2)A Heart of Diamond can be used to craft a Pickarang too.
